argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cntzrecd.z | |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) |
| 2 |  | cntzrecd.t | |- ( ph -> T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 3 |  | cntzrecd.u | |- ( ph -> U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 4 |  | cntzrecd.s | |- ( ph -> T C_ ( Z ` U ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` G ) = ( Base ` G ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_subgss | |- ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> T C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 7 | 5 | #P_subgss | |- ( U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 1 | #P_cntzrec | |- ( ( T C_ ( Base ` G ) /\ U C_ ( Base ` G ) ) -> ( T C_ ( Z ` U ) <-> U C_ ( Z ` T ) ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( T e. ( SubGrp ` G ) /\ U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) -> ( T C_ ( Z ` U ) <-> U C_ ( Z ` T ) ) ) |
| 10 | 2, 3, 9 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( T C_ ( Z ` U ) <-> U C_ ( Z ` T ) ) ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> U C_ ( Z ` T ) ) |
